StatTooltip.MaxHP: The character's Maximum HP. When HP reaches 0 they will be defeated and retreat from battle.
StatTooltip.AttackPower: Affects the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
StatTooltip.DefensePower: Affects the amount of damage received from incoming attacks.
StatTooltip.HealPower: Affects the amount of HP restored by healing skills and damage absorbed by barrier skills.
StatTooltip.AccuracyPoint: Affects the hit rate of attacks. Chance to hit is guaranteed when greater than the target's Evasion.
StatTooltip.DodgePoint: Affects the hit rate of incoming attacks. Evading normally only becomes possible when greater than the attacker's Accuracy.
StatTooltip.CriticalPoint: Affects the chance of dealing critical hits. Critical hits normally only become possible when greater than the target's Crit RES.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageRate: Affects the damage multiplier when the attack critically hits. Reduced by target's Crit DMG RES.
StatTooltip.HealEffectivenessRate: Affects the amount of HP restored by incoming healing by a % amount. Has no effect on barrier abilities.
StatTooltip.OppressionPower: Affects the chance of inflicting a Crowd Control effect. Also affects the amount of CC gauge filled on certain enemies.
StatTooltip.OppressionResist: Affects the chance of being inflicted with a Crowd Control effect. Also affects the amount of CC gauge filled on certain enemies.
StatTooltip.CriticalChanceResistPoint: Affects the chance of receiving critical hits. Critical hits normally only become possible when lower than the attacker's Crit.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageResistRate: Affects the damage multiplier when an incoming attack critically hits.
StatTooltip.StabilityPoint: Affects the amount of random variance in damage dealt by attacks. A higher stability value will result in a higher damage minimum.
StatTooltip.StabilityRate: Affects the amount of random variance in damage dealt by attacks. A higher stability value will result in a higher damage minimum.
StatTooltip.Range: The maximum range of the character's normal attacks.
StatTooltip.AmmoCount: The amount of weapon ammunition. Weapon ammunition is consumed by the character's normal attacks and they must reload when this reaches 0.
StatTooltip.MoveSpeed: Affects the speed at which the character can move.
StatTooltip.DamageRatio: Affects all damage dealt by attacks by a % amount.
StatTooltip.DamagedRatio: Affects all damage received by incoming attacks by a % amount.
StatTooltip.ExDamagedRatio: Affects damage received by EX Skills by a % amount.
StatTooltip.EnhanceExDamageRate: Affects damage dealt by EX Skills by a % amount.
StatTooltip.AttackSpeed: Affects the speed of normal attacks, reloads and attack delay.
StatTooltip.BlockRate: Affects the chance to block incoming attacks when taking cover.
StatTooltip.DefensePenetration: Affects the amount of target DEF that is ignored when dealing damage.
StatTooltip.RegenCost: Affects the rate at which the character generates skill cost.
StatTooltip.EnhanceExplosionRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Explosive damage against a Light Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhancePierceRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Piercing damage against a Heavy Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceMysticRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Mystic damage against a Special Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceSonicRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Sonic damage against a Elastic Armor target.
StatTooltip.ExtendBuffDuration: Increases the duration of buffs granted to self and allies.
StatTooltip.ExtendDebuffDuration: Increases the duration of debuffs inflicted on enemies.
StatTooltip.ExtendCrowdControlDuration: Increases the duration of CC effects inflicted on enemies.
StatTooltip.IgnoreDelayCount: The number of times Attack Delay is skipped when performing normal attacks.

WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthA: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance SMG, SG, HG and FT type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthB: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance AR, GL and RL type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthC: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance MG, SR, MT and RG type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthZ: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance any type of weapon.

BuffTooltip.Buff_AidAttitude:
Continuously restores HP at set intervals.
Activates Mine's Basic Skill upon expiring.
BuffTooltip.Buff_AmmoCount: Increases the maximum amount of weapon ammunition used by Normal Attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ATK: Increases the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_AttackSpeed: Increases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and reduces attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Buff_BlockRate: Increases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostChange: Reduces the amount of skill cost required for using the EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostRegen: Increases the rate at which skill cost is recovered.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChance: Increases the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: Decerases the chance of receiving a critical hit when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamage: Increases the damage dealt by critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamageRateResist: Decreases the damage received from critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedLimit: Limits the amount of damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedRatio: Decreases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamageRatio: Increases all damage dealt by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DEF: Decreases the damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Dodge: Increases the chance of successfully evading attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DotHeal: Continuously restores HP at set intervals.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceExplosionRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhancePierceRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceMysticRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceSonicRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Sonic type attacks against Elastic Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceLightArmorRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Light Armor.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Heavy Armor.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: Decreases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Special Armor.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendBuffDuration: Increases the duration of buffs granted to self and allies.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendDebuffDuration: Increases the duration of debuffs inflicted on enemies.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendCrowdControlDuration: Increases the duration of Crowd Control effects inflicted on enemies.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealByHit_Damaged: Restores HP each time damage is taken from an attack.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealEffectiveness: Increases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealPower: Increases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HIT: Decreases the chance of missing when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionPower: Increases the chance of successfully inflicting Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionResist: Decreases the chance of being inflicting with Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Penetration: Increases the amount of enemy defense that will be ignored by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Range: Increases the distance from which Normal Attacks can be performed.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Shield: Absorbs a set amount of damage.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Stability: Increases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceExDamageRate: Increases the amount of damage dealt by EX Skills.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AmmoCount: Decreases the maximum amount of weapon ammunition used by Normal Attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ATK: Decreases the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AttackSpeed: Decreases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and increases attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_BlockRate: Decreases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Burn: Continuously receives Burn damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Cheerleading: Continuously receives damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Chill: Continuously receives Chill damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CostChange: Increases the amount of skill cost required for using the EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CostRegen: Decreases the rate at which skill cost is recovered.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChance: Decreases the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: Increases the chance of receiving a critical hit when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalDamage: Decreases the damage dealt by critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalDamageRateResist: Increases the damage received from critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageByHit_Damaged: Receives additional damage when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamagedRatio: Increases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageRatio: Decreases all damage dealt by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DEF: Increases the damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Dodge: Decreases the chance of successfully evading attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceExplosionRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhancePierceRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceMysticRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceSonicRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Sonic type attacks against Elastic Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceLightArmorRate: Increases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Light Armor.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Increases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Heavy Armor.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: Increases the damage received from attacks when defense type is Special Armor.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealedLimit: Limits the amount of HP healing abilities will restore.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealEffectiveness: Decreases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealPower: Decreases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Hieronymus: Inflicts continuous damage over time. Inflicts a large amount of damage in a circular area around the target if this debuff is not removed before it expires. This debuff can only be removed by healing the afflicted to 100% HP.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HIT: Increases the chance of missing when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionPower: Decreases the chance of successfully inflicting Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionResist: Increases the chance of being inflicting with Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Penetration: Decreases the amount of enemy defense that will be ignored by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Poison: Continuously receives poison damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Range: Decreases the distance from which Normal Attacks can be performed.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ElectricShock: Continuously receives Electric Shock damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Stability: Decreases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceExDamageRate: Decreases the amount of damage dealt by EX Skills.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_BurnDamagedIncrease: Increases the continuous damage received by Burn debuffs.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ChillDamagedIncrease: Increases the continuous damage received by Chill debuffs.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ElectricShockDamagedIncrease: Increases the continuous damage received by Shock debuffs.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_PoisonDamagedIncrease: Increases the continuous damage received by Poison debuffs.
BuffTooltip.CC_Fear: Unable to act and will slowly move away from whoever inflicted fear on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Stunned: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Provoke: Forced to attack whoever inflicted taunt on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Paralysis: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Emp: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Confusion: Attacks allies instead of enemies. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Frozen: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryEmpty:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5× (half) or 2× (full).
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryHalf:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5×.
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryFull:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 2×.
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_Immortal: Able to withstand most attacks without being defeated for the duration of the effect.
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneDamage: Immune to some or all types of incoming damage.
BuffTooltip.Special_Fury: Increases the damage dealt by Neru's EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_Misdeed: Decreases DEF with each stack held and generates skill cost when Aru (New Year) uses her EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_LittleDevil: Increases Crit DMG with each stack held and increases the damage dealt by Mutuski (New Year)'s Basic Skill when at 6 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Accumulation: All damage dealt to this target for the duration of the effect will be accumulated and dealt again as an additional hit once this expires.
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneCC: Immune to all Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Special_SuddenDeath: A stack of 5 will deal lethal damage to the character.
BuffTooltip.Special_Stamp: Reduces allies' EX skill cost and restores own HP when Kokona reaches 5 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Holiday: Increases the effects of certain EX skills on this character.
BuffTooltip.Special_SilverBullet: Augments Sakurako's normal attack to deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0187Mod: Increases Toki's ATK, Accuracy and Evasion and changes her EX Skill, Basic Skill and Normal Attack pattern. Ends after using the EX Skill 3 times.
BuffTooltip.Special_Omamori: Increases Mystic Effectiveness upon activation of Kayoko (New Year)'s Sub Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_Dado: Kaho's attacks will deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_OldBook: Activates Ui (Swimsuit)'s Basic Skill when at 3 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0089_ExtraPassive: Deals additional damage to the target(s) of Kasumi's EX Skill when at 3 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Pray: Deals additional guaranteed critical damage to the target(s) of Yukari's EX Skill for every 10 stacks held.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0224_Public: Attacks will deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0225_ExtraPassive: EX Skill reduces allies' skill cost when at 3 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0233_ExtraPassive: Attacks will deal damage as an additional hit.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0231_ExtraPassive: Increases Ako (Dress)'s ATK and the damage dealt by her Basic Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0239_ExtraPassive: Increases Kayoko (Dress)'s Crit DMG and changes EX Skill to be guaranteed critical.
BuffTooltip.Special_EN0008_Obelisk: Cannot be targeted by the Fury of Set's lightning strikes.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0220_Public: Enhances various aspects of the Sugar Rush band members' skills.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0263_ExtraPassive_02: Shiroko Terror cannot be defeated for the duration of the effect, but will be defeated once it expires if HP is not fully recovered.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0271_Ex: Increases the effect of Tomoe (Qipao)'s Basic Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_AmplifyDoTAdditionalTick_Poison: Poison debuffs inflcited while under this effect will deal additional damage at set intervals.
BuffTooltip.Special_AmplifyDoTReducePeriod_Chill: Chill debuffs inflicted while under this effect will have the interval between instances of continuous damage decreased.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0273_ExtraPassive: Reduces allies' EX skill cost when gaining 3 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0275_Public: Enhances the effects of Mine (Idol)'s Basic Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_EN0009_UnstableFlame: Increases Chokmah's Incoming Damage when struck by ballista.
BuffTooltip.Special_ExSkillCardRedrawStackDummy: Immediately redraws the EX Skill after it is used.

GroggyCondition.Chesed: Increases when automaton soldiers are defeated.
GroggyCondition.Shirokuro: Increases when hit by own attacks.
GroggyCondition.Hieronymus: Increases when EX Skills are interrupted.
GroggyCondition.Perorozilla: Increases when stunned Perorominions are absorbed.
GroggyCondition.HOD: Increases when Erosion Towers are destroyed or Hod's CC Gauge is filled.
GroggyCondition.HoverCraft: Increases when Missile Frenzy mode ends.
GroggyCondition.EN0005: Increases when Choir Members are knocked down.
GroggyCondition.RaidHoverCraft:
Increases when CC gauge is filled.
Increases when the Missile Guidance System is destroyed.
GroggyCondition.EN0006: Does not accumulate groggy until phase 2.
GroggyCondition.EN0008: Increases after ATG skill is performed.

RaidChangePhase.HPUnder: Changes to phase {0} when HP falls under {1}.

Shortcut.Students: View stats, skills, weapons, equipment and more for all of the playable students.
Shortcut.Calculator: Calculate student and enemy skill damage, healing and other effects.
Shortcut.Raids: View Total Assault, Grand Assault and Joint Firing Drill information.
Shortcut.Items: View data for items, furniture and equipment and where to obtain them.
Shortcut.Stages: View enemy details, maps and rewards for various types of stages.
Shortcut.Crafting: View contents of crafting nodes and the chance of each possible reward.

InteractionTypeDescription.0: Only interacts with the furniture when all other required students (if any) are present.
InteractionTypeDescription.1: Always interacts with the furniture if they are present, regardless of any other students.
InteractionTypeDescription.2:
Optionally interacts with the furniture along with required students.
If all the required students are not present they will not interact.
InteractionTypeDescription.3:
Interacts with the furniture on their own.
If multiple eligible students are present, only one will interact.

UI.settings_server_description: Select the game server to view available content and data from.
UI.settings_language_description: Depending on the region selected, some content may not be translated.
UI.settings_contrast_description: Disables dynamic page backgrounds and certain visual effects for better text readability.
UI.settings_itemids_description: Displays internal item IDs where available.
UI.settings_distanceunit_description: Preferred display unit for skill range and radius distance.
UI.settings_animationunit_description: Preferred display unit for skill animation duration.
UI.settings_animation_description: Use animated icons for certain types of randomized item drops or groups. Note: Setting this to "OFF" will remove the visual hint for randomized drops unless it is hovered over.
UI.settings_servercollection: Use Separate Collection per Game Region
UI.settings_servercollection_description: Stores an individual collection for each game region. Disabling this option will use the collection currently assigned to the JP region for all other regions.
UI.settings_collection_description: Import or export your student collection data.
UI.settings_restorepage_description: Always start Schale DB on the last viewed page.
UI.settings_defaultpage_description: Set whether to load the list page or the last viewed item by default when navigating to a module.
UI.settings_showskilldelay_description: Show the application delay of buff and debuff skills alongside the skill animation duration.
UI.settings_screenmode_description: Limit the width of the display area on wider screens.
UI.collection_import_help: Data can be imported from Schale DB or Justin163's resource planner. (Select Transfer > Export)
UI.collection_import_warning: This will overwrite your current collection
UI.collection_export_placeholder: Click export to generate an export string from your collection
UI.collection_import_placeholder: Paste export string here and click Import
UI.home_timezone: All dates are converted to your local timezone.
UI.event_starts: Starts in {0} days, {1} hours and {2} minutes.
UI.event_ends: Ends in {0} days, {1} hours and {2} minutes.
UI.buff_search: Search for Student or Skill Name
UI.student_weapon_rank_2star_desc: Exclusive Weapon Max Level Lv.30 → Lv.40 / Upgrades Enhanced Skill
UI.student_weapon_rank_3star_desc: Exclusive Weapon Max Level Lv.40 → Lv.50 / Upgrades Terrain Strength
UI.attack_type_normal_desc: Deals 1× damage to Normal Armor, Light Armor, Heavy Armor, Special Armor and Elastic Armor.
UI.defense_type_normal_desc: Receives {0}× damage from Normal, Explosive, Piercing, Mystic and Sonic attacks.
UI.favoritem_none: This student does not have any favorite gifts.
UI.furniture_none: This student does not interact with any cafe furniture.
UI.name: Name
UI.memory_lobby_unlock: Unlocks after reaching bond rank {0} with {1}
UI.terrain_adaption_details: Deals {0}× damage in {1} terrain. Block rate when taking cover is increased by {2}%. Enemy block rate reduced by {2}% when attacking.
UI.rewards_findgift_msg: Each enemy defeated will drop one of the following items:
UI.furniture_templates: Used in the following preset layouts
UI.furniture_interaction_list: The following students interact with this furniture
UI.item_student_favor_default: {0} EXP when given to all other students
UI.item_student_favor_all: {0} EXP when given to any student
UI.item_usedby_gear: Used to improve the following students' unique item
UI.item_usedby_potential: Used to unlock talent levels in the following students
UI.item_usedby_skill: Used to improve the following students' skills
UI.item_usedby_eleph: Used to increase ★ quantity in the following student
UI.item_eventbonus: The following students earn bonus amounts of this currency.
UI.item_contains_random: Randomly rewards one of the following items
UI.item_contains_choice: Rewards a choice of one of the following items
UI.toast_import_success: Successfully imported collection data for {0} students
UI.toast_release_warning:
This content has not yet been released in the current region.
Data from the JP region will be displayed.
UI.home_header: Schale DB is an unofficial database for the iOS and Android game Blue Archive developed by Nexon Games.
UI.home_change_server: Data is available in multiple languages and supports all game regions. Change language and game region in the {0} menu.
UI.home_copyright: Schale DB is not affiliated with Nexon, Nexon Games or Yostar. All game artwork, information and assets used in this database are the property and copyright of the respective authors.
UI.skillinfo_empty: The selected character has no damage-dealing or healing skills to display.
UI.skill_normalattack_circle: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
UI.skill_normalattack_line: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.
UI.skill_normalattack_fan: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
UI.lock_attributes_help: Prevents changes to the student's stats from saving while locked.
UI.info_unavailable: Information for this server is currently unavailable.
UI.appearance_rate_help: The chance of the node being one of the chosen five crafting nodes.
UI.avg_damage_help: Total of all damage hits, using an average based on the attacker's Stability, Accuracy and Crit Rate.
UI.cc_gauge_fill_help: The amount the target's CC Gauge will increase by if it is affected by CC Power/CC Res.
UI.avg_dps_help: The average damage dealt per second by the character's normal attacks, not accounting for Basic Skill activations.
UI.frames_attackenter_help: The duration of the animation after a character stops moving and readies their weapon to attack.
UI.frames_attackready_help: The duration of the character mounting and unmounting their weapon. (For Shun this is entering and exiting a prone stance)
UI.frames_attacking_help: The duration of the character firing their weapon during their normal attack.
UI.frames_attackreload_help: The duration of the character reloading their weapon.
UI.frames_attackstart_help: The delay between starting and stopping normal attacks, when the character needs to reload or perform other actions such as moving and activating skills.
UI.frames_attackburstroundover_help: The delay between normal attacks when the character has ammo remaining.
